src_original: ānāpāna smṛtir yasya paripūrṇā subhāvitā / anupūrvam parijitā yathā buddhena deśitā /
tgt_original: 失譯人名今附西晉錄 佛言：「安般守意具行如法已，欲次第學，如

src_original: sa;imam bhāsate lokam abhra muktaiva candramāḥ // sthitena kāyena tathaiva cetasā sthito niṣaṇṇo apy athavā śayānaḥ /
tgt_original: 如佛說為在天下得明，如陰解月出立，身立意立，坐臥亦爾。

src_original: nityam smṛto bhikṣur adhiṣṭhamāno labheta pūrva aparato viśeṣam / labdhvā ca pūrva aparato viśeṣam adarśanam mṛtyu rājasya gacchet //
tgt_original: 已比丘立意，如是前後會有所益； 已前後有所益，使不復見恠意；

src_original: smṛtiḥ kāya gatā nityam saṃvaraś ca indriyaiḥ sadā / samāhitaḥ sa jānīyāt tena nirvāṇam ātmanaḥ //
tgt_original: 已止意亦守六衰； 常守莫中止，便知無為身。

src_original: yasya syāt sarvataḥ smṛtiḥ satatam kāya gatā hy upasthitā / no ca syān no ca me syān na bhaviṣyati na ca me bhaviṣyati /
tgt_original: 若一切有意常守身，止不願，亦不願有，亦不疑有，亦不疑無有，次第行在所疑，便蚤得度生死；

src_original: anupūrva vihāravān asau kālena uttarate viṣaktikām // yo jāgaret smṛtimān samprajānaḥ samāhito mudito viprasannaḥ /
tgt_original: 若驚意，知定喜淨，時時法觀，能得度老病。
